title: Now Belgium declares loot boxes gambling and therefore illegal

embed.description: Hot on the heels of the Netherlands declaring loot boxes are gambling and therefore illegal, Belgium has had its say. The Belgian Gaming Commission looked at Star Wars Battlefront 2, FIFA 18, Overwatch and Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and found only Star Wars was not in violation of the country's gambling legislation - and that's only because EA stripped out the game's loot boxes after its launch debacle.

replies.body: I wonder how long before we catch up.
